img_text: Getting around the Aussie 4chan ban Problem: As of 18/03/2019, the Australian government has denied it's citizens the most fundamental right; shitposting on 4chan Solution: To get around this, change your NIC's IPV4 settings on your machine, and disable your routers IPV6 capability. This will automatically override your individual machines DNS settings. Link: https://crowdsupporttelstra.com.au/t5/Home-Broadband/ How-to-change-DNS-from-Smart-Modem/td-p/781838 SAVE AND SHARE CUNTS!
